If you are concerned about someone's health, maybe try expressing your concern in a more socially-acceptable way? Please, please, try not to use phrases like "must die." It can be very, very hurtful, and it goes against social protocols, as it can be taken as malicious cursing.

1. He came to Alaska, talked with his mask on, and refused any kind of treatment.
2. He wanted to achieve political goals on pincong, and asked for my help, yet lacked politeness/mannerism and basic political skills.
3. According to my investigation, he's been like that for a very long time. He enjoys trolling and refuses to stop.
4. His trolling behavior attracts terrorists and eventually led to Ali's attack on pincong.
5. He never apologizes for any of his trolling behavior.
6. I doubt he can control his own behavior. (reference: https://pincong.rocks/question/item_id-223534 see comment section)

I would say anything that could accelerate his process of disintegration, simply because I want to get rid of trolls on pincong.
So yes, 'must die' is malicious. Maybe I should take that back.
I'm sincerely sorry if that hurts your feeling.
